Class Umpire

java.lang.Object
GuesserGame.Umpire
class Umpire extends Object
The Umpire class is responsible for conducting the game. It collects the number from the Guesser and each Player, then compares them to determine the winner.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    (package private) int
    numFromGuesser
    The number guessed by the Guesser.
    (package private) int
    numFromPlayer1
    The number predicted by Player 1.
    (package private) int
    numFromPlayer2
    The number predicted by Player 2.
    (package private) int
    numFromPlayer3
    The number predicted by Player 3.
    (package private) Scanner
    scan
    A Scanner object used throughout the game to collect input from the console.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    (package private) void
    collectNumFromGuesser()
    Collects the number guessed by the Guesser using a Guesser object.
    (package private) void
    collectNumFromPlayers()
    Collects the numbers predicted by three players using separate Player objects.
    (package private) void
    compare()
    Compares the number guessed by the Guesser to each Player's prediction.

    • collectNumFromGuesser

      void collectNumFromGuesser()

    • collectNumFromPlayers

      void collectNumFromPlayers()
      Collects the numbers predicted by three players using separate Player objects.

    • compare

      void compare()
      Compares the number guessed by the Guesser to each Player's prediction. Declares the winner based on who guessed correctly.
